content:
Avtoradio je rabljen ampak ohranjen, ima veliko nastavitev zvoka, možnost izklopa notranjega ojačevalca, usb, itd...

Alpine CDA-9884R Features

Full Speed Connection for iPod (requires optional cable)
USB Capability for Music File Playback
Bluetooth Ready
MP3/WMA/AAC playback
CD-R/ CD-RW Compatible
CD Text Display and Scroll
Quick Search
1-Bit DAC
ID3 Tag Information Display
MP3 / CD Changer Control
Zero Data Mute (0 bit Mute)
IMPRINT Ready
Power Specifications

50W x 4 High Power Amplifier
3 Preouts (4V) with Subwoofer Level Control
Display Performance

Glassy knob Illumination: Blue/Green/Red/ Amber
Main illumination: Red/Green
White LCD Lighting, 5x9 Dot Matrix Display
Connectivity

Steering Wheel Remote Control Ready
Vehicle Display Interface Ready
Ai-NET
Bluetooth Ready (requires KCE-300BT)
IMPRINT Ready (requires PXA-H100)
iPod Full Speed ready (requires KCE-422i)
AUX-IN (with KCE-236B)
Audio Processing

Subwoofer Level: -7 ~ +7 dB
Bass Level: -7 ~ +7 dB
Bass Frequency: 60/80/100/200 Hz
Bass Q-Factor: 1~4 (1=wide, 4=narrow)
Treble Level: -7 ~ +7 dB
Treble Frequency: 10/12.5/15/17.5 kHz
High-Pass Filter: 80/120/160 Hz
Bass Engine Pro (requires PXA-H100)
Other Highlights
MaxTune Tuner
Rotary Encoder Volume Control
Remote Control Ready
ISO Connector
Detachable Face Plate
Black out display

Zraven dam tudi škatlo in papirje. Cena 120eu


	




	




Več na ZS
author: Alan
